sentence.Network_en: He took her hand in greeting and asked solicitously how everything was.
sentence.Network_cn: 他握着她的手表示问候，关切地问她一切是否都好。

sentence.Network_en: Eyeing Hung - chien he said solicitously, " Hung - chien , you've lost a lot of weight. "
sentence.Network_cn: 他看了鸿渐一眼,关切的说: “ 鸿 渐 兄, 你瘦得多了. ”

sentence.Network_en: To their surprise Hung - chien merely asked Jou - chia solicitously, " Can the wine stains be washed out?
sentence.Network_cn: 谁知道鸿 渐 只关切地问 柔嘉 : “ 酒渍洗得掉 么 ?

entry.def: A person who is solicitous shows anxious concern for someone or something.

example.ex: He was so solicitous of his guests.
example.tran: 他对他的客人们非常关切。

means.word_mean: 1. in a concerned and solicitous manner;

sentences.sentence: "`Don't you feel well?' his mother asked solicitously"

auth_sentence.content: Murray, hovering solicitously at a buffet of desserts.
